channel.title: Project Runhive (developers needed)
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Whats done so far: 1. www.runehive.com/Forums/ 2. Home Page being made atm - design concept: http://mow.playsnail.com/ 3. Ultimate Hosting from Godddy 4. dual core dedicated server 5. Forum security fix's + add ons
what needs to be done: i am currently playing around with sources.... but cant seem to find any good ones.. 1. Find good source 2. make web client 3. fix bugs & customize
i am in the process in doing what needs to be done.. but need a small development team..
looking for people who can code java and have experience with rsps.
depending on what role you will playing i am prepared to split runehive 50:50[/size]
